content: अभिद्रुह् {c4c} <ab>P.</ab> (<ab>A.</ab> in epic poetry) To hate, seek to injure or maliciously assail, plot against (with <ab>acc.</ab>); नित्यमस्मच्छरीरमभिद्रोग्धुं यतते <ls>Mu. 1</ls>, <ls n="Mu.">2</ls>; क्रूरमभिद्रुह्यति <ls>Sk.</ls> (sometimes with <ab>dat.</ab> also); मया पुनरेभ्य एवाभिद्रुग्धमज्ञेन <ls>U. 6</ls>; नभिद्रुह्यति भूतेभ्यः <ls>Bhāg.</ls>, <ls>Mu. 5.</ls>
